body:
## Introduction

Apollo is a language borne out of the desire for a high(er) performance compiled language (like C++) with clean, simple syntax (like Ruby or Python).  

## Documentation
1. [Quick Tour](https://github.com/mfichman/apollo/wiki/Quick-Tour-of-the-Apollo-Programming-Language)
2. [Tutorial](https://github.com/mfichman/apollo/wiki)
2. [Download and Installation](https://github.com/mfichman/apollo/wiki/Download-and-Installation)
3. [Compiler and Tools Manual](https://github.com/mfichman/apollo/wiki/Compiler-and-Tools-Manual)
4. [Apollo FAQ](https://github.com/mfichman/apollo/wiki/Apollo-FAQ)

## Downloads

* Debian: [apollo-0.2.0.deb](https://github.com/downloads/mfichman/apollo/apollo-0.2.0.deb)
* OS X: [apollo-0.2.0.pkg](https://github.com/downloads/mfichman/apollo/apollo-0.2.0.pkg)
* Windows: [apollo-0.2.0.exe](https://github.com/downloads/mfichman/apollo/apollo-0.2.0.exe)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Apollo Programming Language
